      • getCoinsOfSearch

        java.util.List<Coin> getCoinsOfSearch(int countryID,
                                    int year,
                                    java.lang.String metall,
                                    int userID)
                                      throws DBRecordException
        Returns a list of objects corresponding to all of the records in the database
        Parameters:
        countryID - - Country's ID from databace
        year - - Year of issue coins
        metall - - Material(metall) for coins
        userID - - User's ID from databace
        Returns:
        - All coins selection of the parameters(country, year, metall, user) from databace
        Throws:
        DBRecordException - - if a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection
